fhtw.util

Class BasicKnob

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • fhtw.util.BasicKnob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class BasicKnob
extends javafx.scene.layout.Region
    This is a simple knob control for JavaFX
    0.1.0
    The control now animates correctly when the user sets the value in code.
    Removed a lot of bad code
    Made some getter/setter non-final in order to allow them to be overridden.
    0.1.1
    Fixed problems with the angle.
    Added functionality to completely setup button from fxml.
    Version:
    0.1.1
    Author:
    Paul Volavsek
